-- | Snap framework snaplet for the InfluxDB library
--   
@package snaplet-influxdb
@version 1.0.1.1

module Snap.Snaplet.InfluxDB

-- | Initialize the Influx Snaplet.
initInflux :: SnapletInit b InfluxState

-- | Runs an INFLUX action in any monad with a HasInfluxPool instance.
runInflux :: HasInfluxPool m => (Config -> IO r) -> m r

-- | Runs an INFLUX action in any monad with a HasInfluxPool instance.
runInfluxPost :: HasInfluxPool m => (Config -> IO r) -> m r

-- | Constructs a connect from Config.
mkInfluxPool :: MonadIO m => Config -> m InfluxPool
newtype InfluxState
InfluxState :: InfluxPool -> InfluxState
influxPool :: InfluxState -> InfluxPool
class MonadIO m => HasInfluxPool m
getInfluxPool :: HasInfluxPool m => m InfluxPool
instance MonadIO m => HasInfluxPool (ReaderT InfluxPool m)
instance HasInfluxPool (Handler b InfluxState)
